name: Zero-Footprint Society
description:
Help Weldon Zemke resist the attempts of mega-corporation ZantoCorp to track and monitor all of the citizens of New Atlantica City.

Use your wits, your creativity, and a good dose of sheer firepower to break into their Headquarters, outwit the guards, and disable the tracking Nanites.

Zero-Footprint Society is a tactics game, loosely inspired by XCOM, Fire Emblem, and ShadowRun Returns. 

Developed by Enigma Dragons in just 7 days for  MonoGame Jam.

Source code available on GitHub
